text:
The sound of dry wind rustling through the trees
mixes with the footsteps of a person running
on unpaved earth.

In Earth terms, they were probably in their mid-teens.
Though somewhat short, their well-trained physique
doesn't give the impression of them being small.

The boy runs across the ground at a steady pace,
his breath heaving.
Occasionally, he mutters something.

name: Young Boy From Some Settlement?
text:
Hah, hah... Point A, no abnormalities.
No native creatures observed within visible range,
and the direction of the unexplored territory is-

He's not admiring the scenery for a change of pace.
He quickly moves his gaze, paying attention to
everything that catches his eye.

As always, he feels the strong sunlight
and wind mixed with dust on his skin.
When he breathes in, he smells earth and greenery.

Suddenly feeling something amiss, the boy stops.
After quickly catching his breath, he focuses again
to identify what the wind is carrying.

name: Young Boy From Some Settlement?
text:
-This distinct smell, it's a carnivore's, isn't it...?
Let's get away before it notices.

While being wary of the direction he called "unexplored territory,"
the boy returns the way he came at a faster pace than before.

From the direction he was heading,
a faint sound of a horn could be heard,
signaling him to come back.

name: Young Boy From Some Settlement?
text:
It's the signal for breakfast... I wonder what it'll be today.
No, more importantly, I have to report this
to Mom and Dad first.

name: Young Boy From Some Settlement?
text:
I'm home-
What's for breakfast-
whoa!

The moment he stepped through the entrance,
the boy crashed into a large, thick wall of flesh.

name: A Gentle "Dog"?
text:
Canes, did you go for a walk already?
Next, I'll go for another round with you!
Walk, walk, walk-

name: Canes
text:
Did you just wake up...?
Sorry, Sterio, let's do it later.
And I was just doing 'road work,' not 'walking'.

name: Canes
text:
Dad, Mom, a carnivorous native
creature has shown up nearby.
Should we exterminate it? Should we inform the other 'houses'?

name: Father
text:
Alright, I got it, leave the rest to me.
You and Sterio go wash your hands.
Let's all have something for breakfast first.

Canes and Sterio take off their shoes
and easily step up the ledge,
which is about knee-height for adults.

They walk on the wooden floor to the washroom,
carefully wash their hands with soap,
and then the whole family gathers around the hearth.

name: All
text: Let's eat!

name: Mother
text:
So... Canes, about that native creature
you mentioned earlier,
how many of them were there?

name: Canes
text:
I don't know, I left before I got a good look at them.
If I hadn't been unarmed,
I would've gotten closer.

name: Father
text:
Oh, that's good to hear.
It was right not to bring your hunting tools.
You shouldn't face them alone.

name: Father
text:
Well, what should we do...?
For now, after we eat,
I'll go check it out with our 'neighbors'.

name: Sterio
text:
Papa, going hunting?
Me and Canes will go with you.
Can we?

name: Father
text:
No, probably not today.
I'll let you know when I take
you two with me again, my apprentices.

name: Father
text:
...By the way, Canes, Sterio.
That story you told me and Mom the other day,
were you two serious about it?

Canes, who was slowly enjoying his meal,
was suddenly asked a question and
hurriedly washed down the food in his mouth with water.

Then, recalling the conversation he had with his parents,
he nodded deeply with a serious expression.

name: Canes
text:
I'm serious-
More than inheriting the family business,
I want to be a hero.

name: Sterio
text:
I'm a hunting dog, with Canes.
So I'll be a hero too!
Papa, Mama, will you allow it?

name: Canes
text:
Sorry, Dad, Mom.
Even now, I still want to
become a full-fledged Space Hunter.

name: Canes
text:
I like traveling to Muirauka I and other planets
to help the people in the settlements.
But being both a hero and-

It was the mother who slammed
her finished teacup down on the hearth
and interrupted her son's words.

Will their wish not be granted after all?
Is there no other path allowed
since they were born to inherit the family business-

Canes, driven by such anxiety, and
Sterio, watching the situation unfold,
are both glared at directly by their mother, who shouted.

name: Mother
text:
What are you talking about, you dunces!
Whether it's a Space Hunter or a Hero,
just do both of them!!

name: Sterio
text: Understood, Mama!

name: Canes
text: Whoa!?

The sons react in opposite ways
to their mother's decisive words.

And the father, like Canes,
is truly surprised and objects to the sudden,
outrageous proposal thrown at him.

name: Father
text:
No, no, no, my honey.
Both is impossible, since they each only
have one body to their own, right?

name: Mother
text:
Who decided that you can
only do one job per body?

name: Mother
text:
You want to be a hero.
You don't dislike being a Space Hunter.
Then doing both solves it!

name: Father
text:
Well... there are some who actually manage both,
but isn't it too high a hurdle for the kids
to start with?

name: Father
text:
Besides, you're just deciding on your own
without even having a plan
to make such a thing happen!

name: Mother
text:
Oh... is that what you're saying?
Are you saying you can't
follow my opinion!?

As they seriously consider better ways
for their sons' future,
both parents' tones become stronger.

The people in question, putting aside the fact
that they were the cause of this situation,
watch the scene before them with exasperation.

name: Mother
text:
Then let's settle this according to our family rules.
Get in the ring!

name: Father
text:
"Disputes are settled with fists."
No choice but to do it...
Canes, ring the gong!

Canes, with a look of exasperation,
watches his parents, who are heading towards the dirt floor,
and picks up a small sling.

With practiced hands, he pulls a small iron ball,
and without even aiming,
he casually throws it.

As a pleasant bell sound signals,
the parents keep their distance from each other, and
Canes sighs without even looking at them.

name: Canes
text:
Here they go again, another marital spat.
What do they mean, "our family rules"?
It's a pain to clean up afterwards, you know?

name: Sterio
text:
Space Hunters need strong arms.
It's natural to follow the strong ones.
...That's what Papa said.

name: Canes
text:
It's no use when the one saying it
keeps losing, is it?

name: Canes
text:
They call it a ring, but it's just a mat
laid on the dirt floor, surrounded by ropes...
What if someone gets seriously hurt?

name: Sterio
text:
Papa and Mama love wrestling.
I think it's just right for settling a match.
But, but-

name: Sterio
text:
They started fighting because of us.
Does that mean we really can't be heroes?

name: Canes
text:
Those two don't seem to be against
us becoming heroes at all.

name: Canes
text:
Hah, what a letdown.
I thought I was going to be
scolded for sure.

From the ring, loud shouts
and the sound of one of them being
slammed onto the mat echoed.

Canes and Sterio,
without showing any interest in it,
ate their meal and continued their conversation.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, do you know how to become a hero?
We're apprentice Space Hunters,
and we'll become them if we keep honing our skills.

name: Canes
text:
...Honing those skills is tough, though.
Well, that aside,
you're right, aren't you?

name: Canes
text:
Those people we always see live-
how exactly did they
"become heroes"?

name: Canes
text:
I should have looked into that
properly before telling our parents...
Ah, I messed up the order.

name: Father
text:
Then asking them directly is the best-
AAAAH!!
Not there, your love stings! I give up!

name: Canes
text:
To think you'd surrender before you even joined the conversation...
And is that the fastest the match has ever ended?

name: Sterio
text:
Today's win was decided by Polaris Mask's move,
"Kira-boshi Backbreaker"!

The father, who returned to the living room,
rubs his back
and advises his children.

name: Father
text:
I've already told you two that
your dad here was born on Earth, right?
In a country called Japan on that planet-

name: Father
text:
In summer,
Hero Festa... ah,
what was its official name again?

name: Father
text:
Ah, I remember,
they hold a festival called
"Hero City Summer Festa" in that region.

name: Father
text:
If you go there, you'll see heroes everywhere,
and they'll answer everything you want to know...
Probably.

name: Canes
text:
There's a festival like that!?
I want to go to that Hero Festa
and meet heroes!

name: Mother
text:
That's right... you two,
you're serious about your communication studies too,
so it's alright to let loose sometimes, isn't it?

name: Mother
text:
Our family business has no days off,
so we can't go with you,
but it'll work out for you two somehow.

name: Sterio
text:
Mama, it's okay.
I'll go with him, and if anything dangerous happens,
I'll protect Canes, so don't worry.

name: Canes
text:
I can protect myself too,
there probably aren't any dangerous native creatures
like on Muirauka I during development.

To Canes, who just complained,
his father smiles and replies back
that he's truly dependable.

name: Father
text:
But you know, there are dangerous people too.
Even if they're physically weak, they're cunning.
Young travelers like you are easy targets.

name: Father
text:
Be careful of "friendly" creatures and "kind" merchants...
Well, with Sterio there, it should be fine.

name: Father
text:
People on Earth probably would think
someone with your build is
only fifteen or so, you know.

When they go somewhere out of sight,
their parents always relied on Sterio.
Canes didn't find that amusing.

Even though they were raised as siblings
and trained together to inherit the family business-

He felt as if only Sterio's
abilities are recognized and trusted.

name: Mother
text:
Well, don't worry. Our Canes is smart,
so he won't fall for things like
scams or overcharging.

name: Mother
text:
Go together as good siblings.
Now, that's settled, so let's arrange the spaceship.
Then lodging and tickets and-

His parents' words of honest praise
sound like consolation.
He quietly puts those feelings deep in his heart.

name: Canes
text:
Sterio, let's go for some road work.
We can't do anything during the trip,
so we have to train now.

name: Canes
text:
Also, because of what happened this morning,
I'm changing the course
to go around the settlement.

name: Sterio
text:
Understood!
Walk, walk,
I'll clean up the dishes first!

name: Canes
text:
...Hero City Summer Festa, huh.
I wonder what kind of festival it will be.
Chapter 1 - Peng's Wings to The South

note:
The raw title is 図南の鵬翼 (Tonan no Houyoku),
an idiom meaning one's journey to achieve big ambitions, dreams and the like.

text:
A few days before they headed to Earth.
Hero Festa was also being discussed
at Parallel Flight Inc.

name: Akashi
text:
Wait what, Parallel Flight
isn't participating in this Hero Grand Prix!?

name: Melide
text:
Huh...?
Even with this many people,
we can't participate?

name: Monomasa
text:
Even without me and Yoshiori,
there should be enough heroes
and observers.

name: Huckle
text:
I'm sorry if you were looking forward to it.
Ryekie and I have unavoidable commitments
during the Grand Prix period.

name: Huckle
text:
And-
in fact, [Player] also
received a job offer.

name: Yoshiori
text:
So there won't be any observers
from Parallel Flight who can
participate in the Grand Prix.

name: Exio
text:
Melide's age would probably
make the organizers hesitate...
I can observe, but I'm a bit unstable right now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, the request content
is unrelated to the Grand Prix.
It is, however, related to Hero Festa.

options.text: Sorry Akashi, I'm going to win!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What is that confidence, you!?
You don't even know who you'll be
teaming up with.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Both of you, be careful not to jump to conclusions.
I never said the contents of the request was related to the Grand Prix at all.

options.text: I want to watch this time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The request content is unrelated to the Grand Prix.
...However, watching from the stadium might be difficult.

name: Huckle
text:
I'll explain the details later, but...
For the reasons I just explained, we won't
be participating in the Hero Grand Prix this time.

options.text: I guess I'll look forward to the next one.

name: Mokdai
text:
While it's a shame we can't participate,
I kind of feel like it's okay...
for me, at least.

name: Sui
text:
I see. It's because you can observe
the heroes more calmly
if you're just watching, right?

name: Mokdai
text:
That's part of it, but I'm also curious
about how other companies' cameramen
bring out the heroes' appeal.

name: Mokdai
text:
Ah, I'm looking forward to it.
Which agency will win
this year, I wonder?

name: Crowne
text:
I'm of a similar opinion to Mokdai.
There's a different way to enjoy
these things when you're watching.

name: Akashi
text:
In Crowne-san's case,
if she participated, she wouldn't be able to
drink the whole time, would she...?

name: Crowne
text:
That's not exactly true...
But I'm not prioritizing alcohol
that much either!

name: Crowne
text:
That Grand Prix is a good opportunity
to see how other agencies' Parallel Weapons
move in real combat.

name: Sui
text:
You do have a point...
When fighting monsters or villains,
you can't really observe the details.

name: Sui
text:
I'll try to watch from that perspective
when I'm observing too. Things like
other agencies' suit designs and functionality.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I get it, [Player].
People with specialized skills, their perspective and way of thinking are different from ours at times like this.

options.text: I wish I could watch too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Speaking of which, [Player], you've always been on the participating side, haven't you?
...It's okay, I'll record it properly!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Aren't you a bit too eager for a fight...?
[Player]-san, try not to stress yourself out too much.

name: Crowne
text:
...So, Huckle.
That offer, it was from
Raidark, wasn't it?

name: Huckle
text:
Ah. Just as Crowne says.
It seems they want the cooperation of an "observer"
for a new Hero Festa project.

name: Ryekie
text:
By the way, the request that specifically designated me
and Huckle is from the Hero Grand Prix itself!
This is the unavoidable commitment I mentioned!

name: Ryekie
text:
Whoops!!!
You mustn't tell anyone about this yet!!!!
They asked me not to!

name: Melide
text:
In this case,
should I retort, or something...?
This is a difficult situation, even for me.

name: Monomasa
text:
Judging from his personality,
he doesn't seem to be joking...
That's troublesome in its own way.

Melide and Monomasa are confused by Ryekie,
who is actively leaking information.
In contrast, Exio interjects with a serious expression.

name: Exio
text:
Hmm... Indeed, it would be big news
if an S-class hero were to participate
from outside their affiliated agency.

name: Ryekie
text:
What!? We're not participating
from another agency!!
The request from the Grand Prix is-

name: Huckle
text:
-Ryekie, I'll explain the rest.
Exio-san, please don't joke around
when other companies are involved.

name: Exio
text:
Hehe, no, I apologize.
I didn't expect to be led on
so easily.

options.text: You subtly tried to extract information...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, I think I'll have to request training from a specialized company again.
I'm getting worried...

options.text: You're too lenient with people in the company.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshiori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah... I thought a former soldier wouldn't fall for something so easily.
So that's how it is, I see.

name: Huckle
text:
Now, before we get completely sidetracked,
I'll bring the conversation back.

name: Huckle
text:
Raidark Co., the organizer,
wants to emphasize interaction between heroes and
citizens at this Hero Festa-

name: Huckle
text:
So, in addition to the traditional
Hero Grand Prix and booths from agencies,
they've decided to hold greeting sessions.

name: Huckle
text:
Attendees will be greeted by heroes in suits
they've seen in broadcasts,
and can even receive guidance around the venue if requested.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems to be an attempt to close the distance
between heroes and citizens,
and deepen their interaction.

name: Crowne
text:
So [Player] received an offer...
I see, no wonder
they're short on operators.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems so. After all,
this event is being held concurrently
with the Hero Grand Prix-

name: Huckle
text:
Agencies participating in the Grand Prix
probably won't be able
to cooperate with this request.

name: Huckle
text:
...Therefore, I apologize, [Player],
but we've already accepted the request this time.

name: Huckle
text:
We'd like you to accompany one hero in the greetings,
and assist with transformations, observations, and
greeting support.

name: Huckle
text:
You'll be compensated for your time,
so please consider it a job.

name: Akashi
text:
Then the remaining staff can divide up
and manage the Justice Curry
food stall, right?

options.text: I wanted to help with the food stall.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My apologies, [Player].
It's difficult for the company to refuse a request from the organizer...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text: The curry supervised by Ryekie-san that we offered at the beach cafe food stall before became unexpectedly popular-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So this time, everyone decided to focus on selling Justice Curry!
We'll prepare some side dishes too, just in case.

options.text: Are you opening a store just for that!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text: The curry supervised by Ryekie-san that we offered at the beach cafe food stall before became unexpectedly popular-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So this time, everyone decided to focus on selling Justice Curry!
We'll prepare some side dishes too, just in case.

name: Mokdai
text:
The food stall's sales are no joke.
The line never seems to end,
so it's tough for us serving it, though.

name: Sui
text:
Mokdai, it'll be good exercise
for you right now, won't it?
Your suit's getting a bit tight, isn't it?

name: Mokdai
text:
You can tell just by looking!?
Ah, I see, it's summer and I'm wearing lighter clothes,
so of course the professional designer can tell...!

name: Melide
text:
Good exercise...
Hey, Monomasa.
Shall we help with the Justice Curry food stall too?

name: Monomasa
text:
If it were just a food stall, of course I would,
but shouldn't we avoid showing our faces
at a place where hero industry insiders gather...?

Exio, who had been listening to Melide and Monomasa's
conversation nearby, mutters "hmm" and
considers for a moment.

name: Exio
text:
Indeed, no matter how much President Huckle
has paved the way,
there are all sorts of people in the world.

name: Exio
text:
Before we attract any unnecessary trouble,
it might be better for us to act separately
during the Hero Festa period, what do you think?

options.text: Hmm, is that how it is...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Exio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, I thought you'd say that.
You're so optimistic, I'm truly envious, I wish I could learn from you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Now, now, Exio-san.
[Player] wants to spend Hero Festa with everyone.

name: Huckle
text:
I intended to handle any problems myself,
but I understand your caution towards others.

name: Huckle
text:
Then, how about this. As a work adjustment,
I won't put Exio-san and others
on shift for Hero Festa duties.

name: Huckle
text:
Instead, please work when the Festa staff
take their compensatory holidays.
That's more convenient for the company too.

name: Huckle
text:
Of course, you're welcome to participate
in Hero Festa as general guests on your
days off and visit our food stall.

name: Melide
text:
It's a shame we can't help,
but I'm happy that we can all
participate in Hero Festa.

name: Melide
text:
Can I really take advantage
of President's kindness?

name: Yoshiori
text:
Hold on, Melide, are you seriously planning
to spend the whole period there!?
At an event full of tourists like that?

name: Yoshiori
text:
If you don't have work anyway,
let's relax at some resort
for half of it... Right, Exio-san?

name: Exio
text:
I don't mind either way.
If we're being cautious, it would be better
not to show our faces at Hero Festa much-

name: Exio
text:
However, I don't think such extreme
caution is necessary to deprive
Melide of her fun.

name: Monomasa
text:
That's good, Melide.
Let's all plan it later.

name: Huckle
text:
As the others have heard,
I'll be relying on you all
during the Hero Festa period.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, you're so motivated already.
You'll probably be moving around a lot in the heat, so be sure to take precautions against heatstroke and sunburn.

options.text: What kind of heroes will I meet?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text: Speaking of which, this time, agencies not located in Orient City are also participating, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You might even meet heroes you've never met before, how exciting!
Remember to tell me what they were like!

options.text: When should I take my compensatory holiday...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hey, [Player].
After Hero Festa, how about we align our days off, and-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-No, never mind!
Well, I'll tell you some other time.

text:
[Player] and the members of Parallel Flight Inc.
continue to prepare for this year's summer festival.

And finally, the day of the
"Hero City Summer Festa"
arrives-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is a great success.
As a start to the event, it might be more exciting than in previous years.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: The event staff just explained it, but it seems the greeting sessions are getting a lot of attention.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: It seems not only the ones we know, but even apprentice heroes are being called upon.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: Perhaps that means the organizers are putting a lot of effort into this Hero Greeting event.

options.text: It looked like there was someone with a different suit...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're observant, [Player].
Apparently, that's a feature of this greeting event.

name: Huckle
text:
Apparently, some heroes will be greeting
in special Hero Festa suits...
or so they say.

Huckle reiterates the story he heard
when he received the request from
Raidark Co. to [Player].

name: Huckle
text:
Do you remember the Parallel Cube
that Crowne and the others were developing?
You can think of it as something similar to that.

name: Huckle
text:
...If they were here, they'd surely add
that 'the mechanism is completely different',
though.

name: Huckle
text:
Apparently, it's a special device
developed by a Raidark affiliate
for Hero Festa-

name: Huckle
text:
It's designed so that
the hero suits' design
can change to presets.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems to be something that general observers
can use, so you should be able to transform
heroes as usual.

options.text: I want to try it out right away.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're full of curiosity.
But please wait until you meet the hero you're in charge of.

options.text: I want to tell those two...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: Haha, Crowne and Hisaki-kun might already have that information faster than us, you know?

options.text: Are we doing this without practice again!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry for putting you through that every time.
But this time, it's a low-risk job, so you can relax.

text:
Huckle says that and checks his watch,
and looks around the Hero Festa venue
like he's searching for someone.

options.text: President, do you also have work here?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh no, I was thinking of giving a greeting on behalf of our company to the hero you'll be in charge of now.

name: Huckle
text:
Well... it's about time for the meeting
time the organizers mentioned.
Someone resembling him should appear soon.

name: Huckle
text:
Well, they said he's a rookie
who joined suddenly right before the event,
so maybe he's not used to the place.

name: Huckle
text:
Raidark also seemed flustered.
They had to readjust the operator
pairing.

name: Huckle
text:
...Oh, speaking of which, he's here.
He made it just in time.
Hey, over here!

Huckle waves his hand to a man
who looks like a hero, running from afar,
to get his attention.

name: New Mysterious Hero?
text:
Oh, I'm so, so sorry for being late!
This venue is so vast,
it's hard to remember everything, you know?

name: Rokusei
text:
Nice to meet you! I'm Rokusei,
a 40-something major rookie, nice to meet you!
I'll be in your care during this period, Opera-

name: Rokusei
text: -Ehhhhhhhhh!?

The hero who called himself Rokusei,
after introducing himself,
let out a strange cry and froze the moment he saw [Player]'s face.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-That's right, nice to meet you!
Oh~ I'm so happy to work with someone as sharp as you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You, are you seriously thinking this is our first meeting?
Well, I want it to be our first meeting, you know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
"Want it to be"...
Rokusei-san, you're already acquainted with our employee, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, yes.
I'll explain, so please stop giving me that cold stare, mister...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
Have you met Rokusei-san somewhere before?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah-oh!
It's hard to remember names when it's your first meeting, right, right?
It's Rokusei, Ro-ku-sei!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...I don't know the circumstances, but Rokusei-san, you clearly have met our employee before,  haven't you?

text:
Huckle wears a bewildered expression
next to [Player], who is having
an unexpected reunion.

name: Rokusei
text:
Oh~ maybe so?
Sorry, you know, I'm a rookie but also an old man,
so I forget things easily~.

name: Rokusei
text:
Yes, [Player] and I
are just "slightly acquainted"
from a previous mission.

name: Rokusei
text:
Oh, I never thought I'd see you again.
And for you to observe me this time,
it's a great honor, truly!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hey, [Player]?
If you stay silent, this old man will look
even more suspicious, you know?

options.text: Are you doing well with your main job with that act?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-how rude!
This old man is quite...
No, wait, which "main job" are you talking about!?

text:
Seeing the incredibly awkward exchange
between [Player] and Rokusei,
Huckle sneered.

name: Huckle
text:
...Rokusei-san. I am not here
to expose your secrets,
so please don't worry.

name: Huckle
text:
However, since our employee is involved,
it would reassure me if you could
explain the situation to some extent.

name: Huckle
text:
Of course, I will not speak of your matters to others.
We have a confidentiality agreement, and
I don't mind exchanging additional documents if needed.

name: Rokusei
text:
…………….
[Player], you really work
at a good place, don't you?

name: Rokusei
text:
When someone as sincere as you
treats me like this,
I can't help but want to tell you everything.

name: Rokusei
text:
President, can we move away from here a little?
I'll tell you the current
circumstances truthfully.
